changeSet.createView: SELECT p.name AS parent, p.domain AS parent_domain, rel.name AS relationship, c.name AS child, c.domain AS child_domain, n.inference, n.premise1, n.premise2, n.notes, u.name AS updated_by, w.name AS workspace, n.id, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, n.version FROM existential_network n JOIN existential p ON n.parent = p.id JOIN existential rel ON n.relationship = rel.id JOIN existential c ON n.child = c.id JOIN existential u ON n.updated_by = u.id LEFT JOIN workspace_authorization wa ON n.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON wa.defining_product = w.id WHERE n.inference IS NOT NULL
